description:
With the help of Riche, who wants to escape the cult, Yukito and his team manage to infiltrate Dakini`s cult. Using Riche`s influence, Yukito proceeds to split the followers` loyalty. However, Dakini finds out and puts them all on trial!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: We Know We Are Not Worthy O Great Lord Mitama All Living Beings Were Born by

Ô déesse Mitama, ô divine créatrice, tu nous offres joie et miracles. Tant que j’habiterai ce monde, je partagerai ma foi, et ta miséricorde me couvrira de plénitude. Ô déesse parmi les dieux, ma gratitude est grande et mon être est infime.
カケマクモカシコキ ミタマノオホミカミ モトツミココロノマニマニ ウムシイデ ウシハキマモリ サキハヘタマヘルミイサヲノ オホキヒサシキヒロキアツキ オホムウツクシミヲカゞフリテ コノウツシヨニ アラムカギリハ ヨロズノモトツヒトツカミノ ミタマノミコト キコシメセトカシコミカシコミマヲス
